bike.description: Specialized M4SL Aluminum, 29er singlespeed specific frame w/ XC geometry, fully butted w/ smooth welding, tapered headtube and seat tube, forged post mount 160mm disc dropouts, alloy replaceable der. hanger

components.description: RockShox SID Brain 29, BlackBox Motion Control damper, tapered alloy steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions, external rebound adj., 100mm travel
Integrated 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
Specialized 3D forged 6061 alloy, 4 bolt clamp, 7º rise, 31.8mm
Specialized flat bar, carbon, 680mm wide, 8º backsweep, 31.8mm
Specialized Body Geometry XCT, Kraton rubber w/ gel, closed end, 132mm, lock-on
Avid X0 World Cup R, hydraulic disc, HS1 180mm rotor
Avid X0 World Cup R, hydraulic disc, HS1 180mm rotor
Avid X0 World Cup R lever
Singlespeed conversion kit, 19T Alloy 3/32" cog, alloy spacers and lock ring
KMC X-10L, 10-speed w/ hollow outer links and reusable Missing Link
SRAM X0, carbon, singlespeed specific, GXP
32, aluminum
SRAM GXP BB for 2pc, 73mm shell
Alloy 1pc. body and cage, w/ reflectors, 9/16"
2mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Fast Trak S-Works, 29x2.2", Kevlar bead, 120TPI
Specialized Fast Trak S-Works, 29x2.2", Kevlar bead, 120TPI
Presta valve
Specialized Body Geometry Carve, steel rails, 143mm width
Specialized 2 bolt head, forged alloy, 12.5mm offset, micro adjust, 27.2mm, 350mm or 400mm
31.8mm, forged alloy QR, brass washer
chainstay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
